projects.description: Explore my latest work where creativity meets functionality. Each project represents a unique challenge solved with passion and attention to detail.
projects.collaborateMessage: I'm always excited to work on new projects and bring creative ideas to life. Let's collaborate!

healthMobile.title: Health Mobile
healthMobile.description: Web application focused on personal health tracking, integrating calorie data, menstrual cycle monitoring, and medication reminders.

mchapp.title: MCHAPP
mchapp.description: Professional web application built with Node.js and Express for comprehensive apartment management. Features include smart device control (Sonoff bulbs), user management, and access logging with REST API integration.

neonize.title: Neonize
neonize.description: Python automation solution for WhatsApp messaging with PostgreSQL integration. Designed to automate message sending while managing contact synchronization and message tracking through database integration.

omkromApi.title: Omkrom API
omkromApi.description: REST API backend developed in Swift with Vapor 4 framework and PostgreSQL database. Features authentication and security, user management, email system, and relational data architecture with endpoints for profile management and hierarchical data.

pokemon.title: Pokémon Project
pokemon.description: Interactive Pokedex developed with React and API consumption, featuring an intuitive interface and advanced Pokémon search functionality.

piano.title: Piano Simulator
piano.description: Interactive virtual piano project that allows users to play notes and practice online with responsive design.
